main.name: Derrek Gass
main.description: From the Front-End to the Back-End, and from planning to production, I LOVE everything about software development
main.bio: I'm currently experimenting with Cloud Native applications, serverless architecture, Web Assembly, Rust, and React.  Among other things, I like producing experimental electronic dance music, building synthesizers & other music tools, painting & sketching new designs, skateboarding faster than is reasonable, bottling lightning, and spinning things on fire.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to get in touch with me. I'd love to discuss an opportunitiy to work together.

education.description: I learned everything from mathematics and statistics to OOP & programming concepts

education.degree: A.A. Interdisciplinary Studies: Social & Behaviorial Sciences

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
work.description: Working with a team of six other software developers with SCRUM methodology, I managed the front-end development and integration of a full-stack, progressive web application built with React.js, Node.js, Spring Boot, and deployed with Amazon Web Services. I Developed End to End test automation with Selenium in support of our CI / CD pipeline. I also maintained our product backlog and repository, scheduling and assignment of tasks, and arranged bi - monthly code reviews and client meetings, to render a contract from SRS to shippable product.

work.title: Development Team Leader
work.description: As development team leader, I led the design, prototyping, documentation and delivery of an MVC style web & iOS application for the purposes of automatic, GPS-location based student attendance tracking with canvas integration, using agile project management methodologies.

work.title: Junior Front-End Developer
work.description: I worked with a small, 2-man startup to develop a PaaS to track online sales, inventory, delivery, and invoicing for local businesses with a shoestring budget. I created reusable, responsive UI components with unit and integration testing.

work.title: Sales Lead & Dispatch Coordinator
work.description: I worked in inventory management for a medical supply service to ensure sufficient support of core business goals while enhancing customer satisfaction through quality interaction and efficiency. I also managed sales calls and coordinated successful dispatch of supply shipments through our distribution network.

projects.title: Homeless Population - Explored with D3.js
projects.category: Interactive Exploration of Homelessness by state

testimonials.text: Derrek is highly intelligent with a great eye for detail and understanding of not just the part of a project he is working on, but how that part fits together and integrates with the project as a whole. He is very knowledgeable when it comes to systems design, and optimization and understands how to work well as a part of a team.

That Derrek must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
